pages.text: $(#25228d)Takes Zombies out with superior range, but hides when they get close.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. Hides if a Zombie is 4 blocks near.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)"Who's there?" whispers Scaredy-shroom, voice barely audible. "Go away. I don't want to see anybody. Unless it's the man from the circus."
